intro.name: Dustin Dinsmore
intro.nickname: Excelling in Service, One Guest at a Time

projects.name: FLI Golf
projects.details: Co-founded disc golf league focused on fan experience, elevating player status and viewership, and showcasing partner brands via custom course designs. Team: Andrew Panza (CEO), Dustin Dinsmore (CTO), Corey La Russo (CMO), Alexander Smart (CFO); leveraging market analysis, networks, and partnerships (not competing) to grow the sport and capture market share.

technologies.details: Experienced bartender and manager with 14+ years in high‑volume, guest‑focused venues. Seeking an evening bartender role (Thu–Sun) to deliver exceptional service, drive sales, and keep bar operations running smoothly.
Inventory management; Exceptional customer service; Excellent communication; Ability to work under pressure

Proactive and reliable hospitality professional with a strong track record in bartending and management. Known for adaptability, teamwork, and maintaining composure under pressure to create outstanding guest experiences.

details: Oversee all bar operations and deliver high-quality customer service
Maintain inventory control and handle restocking duties
Prepare and serve a variety of cocktails following standard recipes
Organize and manage bar supplies and equipment for efficiency
Document and report any unusual occurrences or issues to management
Excel in high-pressure, high-volume service during peak hours
Collaborate with team members to ensure smooth operations and guest satisfaction
Managed all aspects of bar operations, delivering exceptional customer experiences
Maintained a clean, organized, and welcoming bar environment
Prepared a wide range of cocktails and beverages to customer specifications
Developed rapport with regular customers, contributing to repeat business
Promoted to Manager within three months due to strong performance and leadership
Managed scheduling, hiring, inventory control, and ordering
Oversaw daily operations to ensure efficient workflow and high-quality service
Fostered effective communication between staff and ownership
Maintained high standards for team accountability and side work completion
Provided bar and floor service, engaging customers and ensuring satisfaction
